name: Search_Comparison_Workflow_v1_0
description: Workflow to compare external web search results (project search tool) with internal codebase search results for R&D insights.

initiate_search_comparison.description: Log the start of the search comparison process.

inputs.content: --- Search Comparison Workflow (v1.0) Initiated for Wearable Sensor Technology for Sexual Stimulation ---

perform_external_search.description: Perform an external search using web search tools to gather publicly available information.

query_params.query: wearable sensor technology for sexual stimulation
query_params.explanation: To gather external context and market trends on wearable sensor technology for sexual stimulation.

perform_internal_search.description: Perform an internal search within the project codebase to gather proprietary information.

query_params.query: wearable sensor technology for sexual stimulation
query_params.explanation: To find internal project information, research, and proprietary data related to wearable sensor technology for sexual stimulation.

compare_search_results.description: Analyze and compare external and internal search results to identify insights and opportunities.

inputs.input_data: {{ { 'external_api_results': perform_external_search.results, 'external_search_reflection': perform_external_search.reflection, 'internal_codebase_results': perform_internal_search.search_results, 'internal_search_reflection': perform_internal_search.reflection } | toJson | default('{}') }}

feed_into_rd_process.description: Generate a report or directive for the next R&D process based on comparison insights.

content.comparison_summary: {{ compare_search_results.stdout | default('Comparison did not produce stdout.') }}
content.next_steps_message: Based on the comparison, the next R&D process should prioritize the identified insights. Standing by for Keyholder directive on implementation.
